input.title: High Risk: Key Vaults with Open Network Access (AZ-003)
input.body:
# AZ-003: Key Vaults with Open Network Access

## Description
Multiple Key Vaults have been identified with open network access, posing a high security risk.

Affected Resources:
- ai-empire-vault-01
- seobaike-vault

## Recommended Action
Restrict network access to these Key Vaults by configuring private endpoints or firewall rules to allow only trusted IP ranges or VNet integration.

Please assign to Azure admin for manual remediation.

input.title: Medium Risk: AI Services with Public Network Access (AZ-004)
input.body:
# AZ-004: AI Services with Public Network Access

## Description
Several Azure AI services (OpenAI instances) have public network access enabled, which is a medium security risk.

Affected Resources:
- ai-empire-openai-australiaeast
- ai-empire-openai-eastus
- ai-empire-openai-japaneast
- ai-empire-openai-southeastasia
- ai-empire-openai-swedencentral
- ai-empire-openai-uksouth
- ai-empire-openai-westeurope
- ai-empire-openai-westus

## Recommended Action
Disable public network access and configure private endpoints or VNet service endpoints for these AI services.

Please assign to Azure admin for manual remediation.

input.title: High Risk: GitHub Repository is Public (GH-001)
input.body:
# GH-001: Repository is Public

## Description
The GitHub repository is set to public visibility, exposing source code and potentially sensitive information.

## Recommended Action
Change the repository visibility to private. Review and remove any sensitive data if already exposed.

Please assign to GitHub admin for manual remediation.
